text: Nde mbe gari mpiiŋsɨgi, nde vhɨra tɨvir vhuuiŋra mba nden ŋgari ŋaari gumgir khɨnin muuŋri. Nde fhura rɨrɨvar mbe ndɨɨi tɨvi, nde nta kuegɨri. Nde khueŋ kaŋgiri, kha Hevenan ki Guma Bakɨme, ana nde Guma Bakɨme gum, ana vhɨra mben Guma Bakɨme ma. Ana tɨva bavira zɨn vov, za kha gumgi gu mbigi mbui tɨvi ga nzuav, mbe garav mbe nzuai.
